About

‚ÄúI think everybody in this country should learn how to program a computer because it teaches you how to think.‚Äù

‚Äî STEVE JOBS

Everyone Can Learn To Code

Awesome Inc U exists to help people learn how to create software. If you want to program your own website, mobile app, or video game, we can help you get started. We do this in four ways:

  1. A series of hands-on, in-person classes
  2. Online video courses
  3. Office Hours Membership (like a gym membership for #learntocode)
  4. On-site training for schools, companies, and organizations

Our classes are attended by students, independent entrepreneurs, and corporate teams. It‚Äôs never too early or too late to learn to code. You don‚Äôt need to be a genius to learn to code, you just need to be determined. From musicians, to athletes, to billionaire founders of tech companies, lots of successful people want YOU to learn to code.

Want to learn more? Check out the Frequently Asked Questions ->

Testimonials

Alumni Reviews!



"Good introduction to Android programming for both new and experienced programmers. The instructors were very knowledgeable, willing to answer any questions, and intent on making sure everyone understood the concepts behind the coding. The pace of the class was ideal as each new topic built upon the last. As a result, I have a much more confidence in doing mobile development on my own. I would recommend this class for anyone looking to develop coding skills that are in high demand. I plan on signing up for the more of these classes in the future." -Robert B.

Courses Taken: Android









"This was a fantastic course and I'd highly recommend taking it. The Awesome Inc. team kept a seemingly tedious subject fun and interesting with games, jokes and sandbox time. It was a very hands on class and by the end, we had built an actual website from scratch. They're not just blowing smoke -- Awesome Inc. really is awesome!" -Chelsea Nicole Stamper

Courses Taken: Basic Web Development









"I think the Awesome Inc U courses are Awesome! They are extremely helpful, way more helpful than the several computer science courses I've taken at my University." -Kyle R.

Courses Taken: iOS, Android, Python, Unity, and Basic Web Development









"I've always wanted to learn how to code but thought it would be too hard. I feel like a coding guru after taking just a few Ainc U courses. The hands-on approach makes learning how to code easy." -David B.

Courses Taken: Ruby on Rails and Basic Web Development

Please pass along our appreciation to everyone else at Awesome Inc. It was great to work with everyone on this event and look forward to growing our partnership into the future." -Michael Wlosinski, STEAM Academy

Employers

Employment Partners

It's no secret that software developers are some of the most sought-after employees today. Awesome Inc U partners with technology companies and startups to help employers find the best candidates, and to help our students find the best jobs out there.
